name: Bomblock
description:
A tetris like game where you build walls to protect your castle from bombs.

How to play:

Press Space to spawn in the first block (only need to press Space once per "life")

Press Arrow Up to rotate

Press Arrow Down to go down faster

Press and hold Arrow Down to activate gravity on your block

Press Arrow Left or Right to control the side movement of the block

Objective:

Step 1: Build a wall

Step 2: Protect the Castle!

Step 3: ???

Step 4: Profit
